caption.title: The DEGsâ€™ volcano graph between group N and group B (the control group).
caption.p: The x-axis represents the log 2(fold change) for each gene of the S. pasteurii transcriptome. The y-axis represents the negative log 10 of the FDR-adjusted P-value. Green dots represent genes that were significantly down-regulated. Red dots represent genes that were significantly up-regulated.
